立.definition: to stand; to set up; to establish; to lay down; to draw up; at once; immediately

立交.definition: abbr. for 立體交叉|立体交叉[li4 ti3 jiao1 cha1] overpass

立傳.definition: to record sb's achievements in writing; to write a biography enhancing the subject's image

立像.definition: standing image (of a Buddha or saint)

立冬.definition: Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November

立刀旁.definition: name of the lateral "knife" radical 刂[dao1] in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18), occurring in 到[dao4], 利[li4], 別|别[bie2] etc

立功.definition: to render meritorious service (one the three imperishables 三不朽[san1 bu4 xiu3]); to make worthy contributions; to distinguish oneself

立地成佛.definition: to become a Buddha on the spot (idiom); instant rehabilitation; to repent and be absolved of one's crimes

立夏.definition: Lixia or Start of Summer, 7th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 5th-20th May

立委.definition: abbr. for 立法委員會|立法委员会[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2 hui4]; abbr. for 立法委員|立法委员[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2]

立定.definition: to stop; to halt; halt!; to hold resolutely (of a view, an aspiration etc)

立山區.definition: Lishan district of Anshan city 鞍山市[An1 shan1 shi4], Liaoning

立德.definition: to distinguish oneself through virtue (one the three imperishables 三不朽[san1 bu4 xiu3])

立志.definition: to be determined; to be resolved

立意.definition: to conceptualize; to come up with the central idea; concept; central idea; to be determined (to do sth)

立方.definition: cube (math.); abbr. for 立方體|立方体[li4 fang1 ti3]; abbr. for 立方米[li4 fang1 mi3]

立春.definition: Lichun or Beginning of Spring, 1st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气[er4 shi2 si4 jie2 qi5] 4th-18th February

立案.definition: to register (to an official organism); to file a case (for investigation)

立案偵查.definition: to file for investigation; to prosecute (a case)

立正.definition: to stand straight; attention! (order to troops)

立氏立克次體.pinyin: lì shì lì kè cì tǐ

立法.definition: to enact laws; to legislate; legislation

立法院.definition: Legislative Yuan, the unicameral legislature of the Republic of China

立秋.definition: Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August

立竿見影.definition: lit. set up a pole and immediately see its shadow (idiom); fig. to get instant results

立蛋.definition: egg balancing (activity popular in China at Lichun 立春[Li4 chun1] etc); to stand an egg on its broad end

立言.definition: to distinguish oneself through one's writing (one the three imperishables 三不朽[san1 bu4 xiu3]); to expound one's theory

立論.definition: to set forth one's view; to present one's argument; argument; line of reasoning

立足.definition: to stand; to have a footing; to be established; to base oneself on

立身.definition: to stand up; to conduct oneself

立身處世.definition: (idiom) the way one conducts oneself in society

立軸.definition: vertical scroll (painting or calligraphy); vertical shaft (of a machine)

立體交叉.definition: three-dimensional road junction (i.e. involving flyover bridges or underpass tunnels); overpass
